info.title: Price Comparison
info.description:
This Price Comparison api India find and compare product prices from various eCommerce sites. The developer can add his/her own affiliate id to the returned URL. This can be used to ecommerce price comparison websites or apps. Note: This is a basic version of our API, for full version visit  http://www.datayuge.in/.
Keywords : online price comparison, price comparison india, price comparison sites india, price comparison, Price check india, compare prices, price compare, compare price, price comparison sites, compare prices online, price comparison websites, price comparison website, price comparison api india, price checker

get.description: Gives the URL containing compared prices of various sites. Note: This is a demo version of our services. Our Paid Services actually differ from demo version. For more details, visit our website http://www.datayuge.in

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Enter the Product/ UPC of the product.
